price: N̄ǹkan ìgbádùn ní ọ̀nà tó dára tún máa wà fún àwọn obìnrin tí wọ́n kọ̀sílẹ̀. Ojúṣe l’ó jẹ́ fún àwọn olùbẹ̀rù Allāhu.
arabic: وَلِلۡمُطَلَّقَٰتِ مَتَٰعُۢ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walil'muṭallaqāti matāʿun bil-maʿrūfi ḥaqqan ʿalā al-mutaqīna
